info.name: TPPC Orange+Blue
info.description:
A Blue+Orange theme. With a Giratina banner. New one with shiny giratina(origin) will be replaced.

v1.0 Colors Fixed

Upcoming:
v1.1 New Banner

style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("tppcrpg.net"){body{background-color:#CCCCCC !important}#tAoDp,#footer{background-color:#b8b8b8 !important;color:#000000 !important}#header{background-color:#000000 !important;background-image:url(http://i39.tinypic.com/o7j283.png) !important}li.h,#switchSidebar div,.error,.maintenance,.maintenance div,.red,.ranks th, .dex th{background-color:#FF9900 !important;color:#fff !important}.r1{background-color:#CCCCCC !important;border-top-color:#fefefe !important;border-bottom-color:#c2c2c2 !important;}.r0{background-color:#CCCCCC !important;border-top-color:#fefefe !important;border-bottom-color:#c2c2c2 !important;}li.r1 a{background-color:#333333 !important;border-color:#333333 !important;color:#616161 !important}li.r0 a{background-color:#333333 !important;border-color:#333333 !important;color:#616161 !important}.notice,.error,li.rs div img,#cBox,.success,#configure li,.innerContent,.rosterContent .row0{background-color:#616161 !important}.rosterContent .row1{background-color:#eb8500 !important}#leftR h3,#rightR h3,#leftR ul li div,#rightR ul li div,.profileBox,#profile li div.i,.eBox div,#breed .holder .starter,#breed ul li div.roster,#buy td,#towers td div.i{background-color:#d6d6d6 !important}.ld{border-color:#000000 !important}#inner{background-color:transparent !important;color:#000000 !important}}
